;When she saw his tears, she calmed down and lowered her head to look at him. what do you mean? she says. Tears are too cheap, especially when it comes to two liars. She is inexplicably calm. He actually couldn't explain clearly. It seemed that once she left, he would burst the dam, but why did it burst? He hasn't cried in ten years, and his shell has long been extremely hard. His mood is as stable as a century-old bastard, and he has always made people feel calm and reliable. Suddenly, it was over. He hugged her body tightly and pulled her into his chest. Did he want to have sex with her again? He thought that he had sex with his wife half a year ago. She would plan the day, clean herself, clean him again, lay out the sheets and quilts, as if it was a religious ceremony, and she could only move on fixed mats. During this period, she would remind him whether he had crossed the line and whether the bodily fluids would be poured out unnaturally. He was nervous and like a machine without emotions. She didn't know when he had been like this from the beginning or whether he had been like this from the beginning. He said no. clear. Or maybe she lied to him? Her name is not Wang Li, and even her ID card is fake. She doesn't have any job. She is going to the next hotel. This seems to be her job. He doesn't like it. He hopes that she can find a serious job and not be too tired. , she was so thin that it was impossible for her to do hard work and move anything. He could pick her up after get off work, pick her up every day, and go eat at KFC together. The KFC here allows you to order via mobile phone. The order code pops up on the electronic screen, and the waiter can prepare the meal in less than two minutes. He feels magical. Or maybe this is not his city. He doesn’t know the aunt selling tofu puffs on the street corner. He doesn’t know how much apples cost per pound here. There are several parks where you can walk, and you can take a few buses to the commercial center to see them. How much is the house price here? Can he afford another house?

;

;Thinking of this, he seemed to have merged into her life, like a baby who had made a mistake, sobbing with all his strength. She leaned down and kissed his tears away. He stood up and went to bite her lips, but she didn't refuse and made him lipstick all over. They all laughed. She reapplied her makeup and said that she was going to be late for work. It would take an hour to get there from here, and he had to let her go. He asked her to say that she loved him. She giggled and said it twice as if coaxing a child. He was content. He made up his mind, he wanted a divorce and crawled out of his body bag like a chrysalis.

;

;After Wang Li left, his thoughts became even stronger. He couldn't tell where the conflict between getting closer and leaving came from, but he just had to do it. For the first time, he felt that he was beginning to control himself. He made a detailed plan. At this time, Wang Li turned into a vague concept in his mind and began to lose focus. Before he got on the plane, he sent Wang Li a message asking her to wait for him, but she did not reply. His excessive enthusiasm did not dissipate for a long time.

;

; 

;

;In the days after he returned, he had been making plans. His wife was waiting for him to pick her up. He forgot what they had argued about before, and she returned to her parents' home. But it wasn't important anymore. Wang Li's enthusiasm was fading, and he was a little anxious. He sent a text message, but she didn't reply until two hours later, which was tepid. His mood was very chaotic. He was pacing around the room. He learned to smoke one cigarette after another. He wanted to pick up his wife tomorrow. No, not to bring her back, but to talk about it. He couldn't wait.

;

;He called Wang Li, but she didn't answer. He looked at his phone and saw that it was midnight again. Maybe she had fallen asleep. He hadn't figured out how to tell his wife yet, but if that didn't work, he would show off his cards and tell her about having sex with Wang Li. He thought about it and felt a little proud. He knew that this emotion was wrong, but he couldn't restrain it. He tried to lie down and sleep, but insomnia struck him. He opened Douban on his mobile phone and found that the group was still there. He left messages one by one after Wang Li’s new topics, but unexpectedly found that someone had already commented on them. She talked with her in a playful tone. The man replied and turned off the screen. His stomach growled and he was hungry, so he went out to look for food and thought of KFC.他在手机地图里搜索，最近的一家1.8公里，这里他很熟悉，他手动调整路线，把距离缩短为1.1公里，他出门了。

;

;他想好了，要买两个牛肉汉堡，一份大薯条，一个玉米杯，一杯奶茶，他上次什么也没吃，这回要吃个够。路上他继续给王丽打电话，嘟了几声没有人接，点开信息，十分钟前收到回复，王丽说在加班，明天再联系。他低头看着人行道的瓷砖，安下心来，得过且过，生活不过如此。等明天把想法跟王丽说说，不会太久，他知道手续怎么办，那些睡不着的夜晚他都查过，王丽也曾经试探过，界限在哪，彼此也都清楚，生活即将重新开始，豆瓣和网络终究要落到实处，他体会过实处，王丽的身子骨是软的，她同样不期待但积极的态度确实在无形中感染他，他决定就明天，把什么都摊开来。

;

;肯德基里只有两个人在吃饭，他走到柜台前，服务员给他示意手机点餐，他说，全国都这样了啊！他的语气没有一点惊讶，倒是很骄傲。服务员点点头说，是的。他打开点餐软件，和点餐软件放在一起的是查找我的朋友，他下意识点进去，看到小丽的头像在那家他去过的如家酒店上方悬挂着。他关掉软件重再进入，头像还在那。

;

;愣了几秒，服务员说，先生，要不要我帮您操作。他小声嘀咕，你说，烧水壶里会煮内裤吗？服务员皱起眉毛前探着身子，没听清他说什么，但还是礼貌地回复说，是的，先生，全国都这样了。他回过神，咯咯笑了起来。
